name: Distinctive Quality, LLC
description:
Distinctive Quality helps companies communicate value.
It is the creative endeavor of Ovi Demetrian Jr who specializes in web design and interface design. In the age of information and instant communication, anyone can get their idea out into the world.
The tough part now becomes how to communicate effectively. How to build memorable experiences by standing out in the market and in people's minds. And how to do it consistently.
